data.title: Pandaren Last Name
data.meta_description:
I tried to post this in the lore section but for some reason it won’t let me make a new topic there. 
I need advice on a last name for a Pandaren. She’s an alchemist and a cook…and sometimes she accidentally combines tho…
data.text:
I tried to post this in the lore section but for some reason it won’t let me make a new topic there.

I need advice on a last name for a Pandaren. She’s an alchemist and a cook…and sometimes she accidentally combines those professions with hilarious results (though I would like to make it so she does sometimes make Really Helpful Items so she ultimately becomes well known for this). She’s friendly and cheerful but a bit of a klutz at times.

I’ve got her first name, but not her last name. Any help appreciated!

Stormbrew

That was actually my pandaren monk’s original name. I lost it when I changed servers. I miss it terribly.

Or…

Brewbaker

That’s his new name. I got it from the Robert Redford film.

Even though they’re just first names to me, I always kind of imagined them working as a surname for him.
